altername_name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Kouyasai: A Sherd of Youthful Memories
name: Kouyasai: A Sherd of Youthful Memories
overview: Kouyasai - A Sherd of Youthful Memories tells the story of a young boy in his last year of high school when he want to become the classroom king of the year (the most popular one). To become that he will have to win the election that will take place in the festival at the end of the year. He will also will gain their trust working with them in the different jobs to prepare the festival. To become a better friend with a girl is important to choose her as your partner to go to school, invite them to a date or going with you on a holiday. During the game he will encounter different classroom mates and will talk to them and the game features a response system in real time that depending of the answers the attitude will change. There are also different events that will happen during the game and will also make friendships become stronger or worse. At the end of game the dance festival will take place and you have to declare your love to the girl that you choose and what will be the ending will depend of what the player had done during the game. The game features japanese character voices and different endings.
